title: Marry to the Enemy of My Enemy
overview: Xia Nuan tracks down a kidney donor for her step-sister in South Asia. But it turns out her kidney is the perfect match. Just as she's about to go under the knife, she figures out her step-father and step-sister's hidden agenda. They're wolves in sheep's clothing. Thanks to Zhong Xinyang, an underground fighter, she makes a dramatic return at the funeral her step-father "thoughtfully" plans for her...
